format: shell script / Makefile / Configuration include (BitBake/N configurations)
description: This file contains configuration settings and tuning parameters specific to the Cortex-M1 processor architecture, used within the build system for embedded Linux distributions. It includes variable definitions, feature enablements, and architecture-specific flags.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: Utility method to check for the presence of a feature within build variables.
